function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Proximity-based placemaking approach may lead to close contact and potential spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion among individuals in close proximity.","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing measures, hygiene protocols, and ventilation strategies to minimize the risk of contagion.","Technologies":"Sensors for monitoring occupancy, air quality sensors, and contact tracing apps.","People":"General public, local entrepreneurs, and urban actors.","Owner":"Local authorities, property owners, and urban planners."}]}
